keyMoments.title: Learns Robin's Destination from Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Iceburg informs Nami and Chopper that Robin will be on the sea train departing at eleven, bound for Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Nami receives critical information about where Robin is being taken and the tight timeline they're working against.

keyMoments.title: Tearfully Calls Out to Robin
keyMoments.description: Arriving too late at Blue Station, Nami tearfully watches the sea train depart with Robin aboard, unable to stop it.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional climax showing Nami's desperation and the crew's failure to prevent Robin's capture. This moment cements their resolve to mount a rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Observes Robin Boarding Without Resistance
keyMoments.description: Hidden near Blue Station, Sanji watches Robin being escorted onto the train and realizes she could easily overpower her guards but chooses not to resist.
keyMoments.significance: Sanji understands Robin's self-sacrifice and her determination to protect the crew, deepening his resolve to save her.

keyMoments.title: Boards the Sea Train Alone
keyMoments.description: Realizing he can't wait for the others, Sanji makes the critical decision to secretly board the Puffing Tom alone to protect Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's dedication to Robin and his willingness to face CP9 alone. This decision leads directly to the sea train battle arc.

keyMoments.title: Boards Sea Train Without Resistance
keyMoments.description: Robin allows herself to be escorted onto the Puffing Tom by Marine guards despite having the ability to easily overpower them, continuing her self-sacrifice to protect the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's resolve to sacrifice herself for the crew's safety, a decision that will be the emotional core of the Enies Lobby arc.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Whispers for Usopp's Return
keyMoments.description: While leading a search party calling out for Luffy and Zoro, Chopper quietly whispers 'please come back, Usopp!' The accompanying soldiers copy him exactly.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's emotional state regarding Usopp's departure and his longing for his friend despite the crew's conflict.

keyMoments.title: Learns Robin's Destination from Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Iceburg informs Nami and Chopper about the sea train's departure time and destination of Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Receives critical information about the rescue mission parameters.

keyMoments.title: Gets Stuck Between Buildings
keyMoments.description: Luffy becomes jammed between two buildings while rushing to the train station, unable to free himself despite his rubber body.
keyMoments.significance: Prevents Luffy from reaching the station in time, demonstrating the crew's fragmented state and adding comedic relief to the dramatic situation.

keyMoments.title: Face-Plants into Chimney
keyMoments.description: While leaping across rooftops trying to reach the station, Zoro misses his footing and faceplants into a chimney, getting stuck.
keyMoments.significance: Classic Zoro moment showcasing his directional difficulties, preventing him from reaching Robin in time while providing comic relief.

keyMoments.title: Brought to Blue Station as Captive
keyMoments.description: Blueno carries the captured and bound Franky in a sack to Blue Station where CP9 prepares to board the sea train.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky as a captive of CP9, establishing him as one of the people who needs to be rescued.

keyMoments.title: Beaten by Guards on Sea Train
keyMoments.description: After being thrown into the back of the sea train, Franky threatens the guards and is subsequently beaten along with Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's defiant nature even when captured and the dire circumstances he and Usopp face.

keyMoments.title: Brought to Blue Station as Captive
keyMoments.description: Blueno carries the captured and bound Usopp in a sack to Blue Station where CP9 prepares to board the sea train.
keyMoments.significance: Usopp, despite leaving the crew, is captured alongside Franky and becomes part of the rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Beaten by Guards on Sea Train
keyMoments.description: Thrown into the back of the sea train with Franky, Usopp is beaten by Marine guards.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's helpless situation as a captive.

keyMoments.title: Leads CP9 to Blue Station
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci leads CP9 to Blue Station with their captives Franky and Usopp to board the Puffing Tom to Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Lucci's leadership of CP9 and the successful completion of their Water 7 mission.

keyMoments.title: Shows No Sentiment About Leaving Water 7
keyMoments.description: Lucci coldly states he has no feelings about leaving Water 7 after working undercover there for many years.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Lucci's emotionless, professional nature and complete dedication to his mission over personal connections.

keyMoments.title: Dismisses Kalifa Arrogantly
keyMoments.description: When Kalifa apologizes unnecessarily, Lucci dismisses her in an arrogant manner, showing his superiority complex.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Lucci's personality and the hierarchy within CP9.

keyMoments.title: Apologizes to Lucci
keyMoments.description: Kalifa apologizes unnecessarily when Lucci corrects her about the mission, showing the dynamic between CP9 members.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the hierarchy and Lucci's dominance within CP9.

keyMoments.title: Carries Captive Franky and Usopp
keyMoments.description: Blueno carries the bound Franky and Usopp in sacks to Blue Station as CP9 prepares to board the sea train.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Blueno's role in transporting the captives.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Blue Station with CP9
keyMoments.description: Kaku accompanies CP9 to Blue Station as they prepare to depart Water 7 for Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Part of CP9's successful mission to capture Robin and the Pluton blueprints.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Sea Train Details to Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Iceburg informs Nami and Chopper that the sea train is departing at eleven, CP9 and Robin will be on it, it's bound for Enies Lobby, and he has no power over it since it's run by the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the Straw Hats with critical intelligence about Robin's location and destination, enabling them to plan their rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Clears the Straw Hats' Name
keyMoments.description: Paulie tells the mob that the Straw Hat Pirates are not responsible for the attack on Iceburg and redirects their efforts to help search for the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Clears the Straw Hats' reputation and turns former enemies into allies, demonstrating Paulie's integrity and beginning reconciliation.

keyMoments.title: Orders Robin's Boarding
keyMoments.description: Marine Captain Corgi orders guards to escort Robin onto the Puffing Tom sea train.
keyMoments.significance: Facilitates Robin's transport to Enies Lobby as part of the World Government's operation.
